subject: ECONOMIC DEBT RECONCILIATION
body:
ECONOMIC DEBT RECONCILIATION COMMITTEE BOARD
Attention Beneficiary,
Permit me to introduce myself. I am  Mrs. Elizabeth Johnson, the appointed director of the Debt Reconciliation Board. The information available to us is that you have done virtually everything to have been paid money owed to you yet, you have not received your money.
We would like you to give us brief details about your unpaid money without prejudice; We vie for funds emanated from; contract/inheritance/lottery money, send your contact details, phone numbers, and how you wish to receive your unpaid sum. Also attach your scan ID and give us clear information on your previous experience for our record. We are going to make sure that you will receive this approved sum.
Please help us to serve you better.
Yours truly,
Mrs. Elizabeth Johnson

subject: Re:   ECONOMIC DEBT RECONCILIATION
body:
Hello Mrs. Elizabeth Johnson,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I must say, your message has piqued my curiosity. Could you please elaborate more on this unpaid money that you mentioned? I don't recall having any outstanding debts or payments due to me.

Also, could you provide more information about the Debt Board and your role as the appointed director? It would be great if you could share some details about how this process works.

I'm sorry but I won't be able to provide my personal contact details or ID at this stage. However, I am interested in understanding more about this situation.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Caroline

subject: YOUR RESPONSE PLEASE
body:
Attention Mrs Caroline,

Thanks for your quick response to our payment notification, since you said
you know nothing about this payment we are talking about, I think this what
actually  happened,  If you can recall some years back, some people wrote
you a letter/email that they wanted to transfer millions of dollars of
inheritance/ contract funds into your account and you people will share at
an agreed ratio.

Yes,you  opened up communication with them but after sometime, you cut off
the communication. That transaction is real as your name is now
continuously appearing in the books of accounts of the World Banking Union
Consolidated account as one of the external debtors to be paid. The
authorities now, have decided after negotiations with the IMF to pay only
$50 Million USD to you, that is if you are willing to process it.

However, the payment process/procedures will be made known to you once you
indicate your interest to lay claim on the said fund.

I wait for your response.
Thanks,
Mrs, Elizabeth Johnson

subject: Re: YOUR RESPONSE PLEASE
body:
Hello Mrs. Elizabeth Johnson,

Thank you for your detailed explanation. I must admit, it's a bit surprising to hear about this payment as I don't recall any such correspondence from the past. However, I'm intrigued by the situation and would like to understand more.

Could you please provide some more information? For instance, when exactly was this agreement made and who were the other parties involved? Also, could you clarify what is meant by "the payment process procedures will be made known to you once you indicate your interest to lay claim on the said fund"?

I appreciate your patience in helping me understand this better.

Best wishes,
Caroline

subject: Waiting to hear from you
body:
Attention Mrs. Caroline.

Good day and thanks for your response, I understand that you still couldnâ€™t
recall when this happened, probably because it has been a long time
now.  However,
it was made 18/01/2024 and the parties involved in this payment decision
are the International Monetary Fund (IMF) and the World Bank.

"The payment process procedures will be made known to you once you indicate
your interest to lay claim on the said fund"?

Meaning, you will re-confirm your current details for payment approvals
from the authorities responsible for the payment and the financial
institutions.


I wait for your response.
Thanks,
Mrs, Elizabeth Johnson
